name: @igorjs/gh-actions-clean-workflow
description: Github Action to delete old workflow runs

scripts.build: ncc build src/index.ts -o dist --minify --no-source-map-register --target es2022 --license licenses.txt
scripts.all: npm run lint && npm run build

author: Igor J. S. <oss@mail.igorjs.io> (https://igorjs.io/)
